ModMetaData.name: Propaganda TV
ModMetaData.author: Jelly
ModMetaData.description:
This mod aims to aid you in reducing your colonists certainty in their Ideology for ease of conversion. When a colonist that is any Ideology other than your starting Ideology, it will reduce certainty. [h1]Mod notes[/h1]
Save game compatible. Add/Remove as you like.
No additional research needed.
Uses a comp for the functionality (ensure you have a tickerType Normal) so feel free to add compatibility to other modded TV/Radio versions when this mod is loaded. You can control the range and relative effectiveness.
Place after "Rimflix" in the mod load order.
[h1]Legal[/h1]
This mod accepts no responsibility for the loss of TVs due to colonists actions.
